contentList.content: Embrace the shadows with the Dark Cleric, a fallen beacon of celestial grace turned to darker powers. Wield necrotic energies, unleash auras of dread, and dominate the battlefield with dark, devastating spells.
This resource represents the dark power you wield, growing stronger as you embrace the shadows.
Whenever you cast a spell that restores HP, you regain additional HP equal to 1d6.
When you hit a creature with a spell, you regain 5% of the spell’s damage as health.
When you hit with a spell, you heal for a percentage of the damage dealt, siphoning life from your enemies.
A powerful passive that grants significant bonuses at level 8.
A shadowy ability that provides additional benefits at level 10.
A domain-based ability that activates at level 11.
A domain-based ability that activates at level 11.
An eclipse-based passive that becomes available at level 12.
You gain advantage on Stealth checks when in dim light, allowing you to blend into the shadows more effectively.
Your resistance to necrotic damage is enhanced, and you gain immunity to the frightened condition.
Your spells that deal necrotic damage are increased in potency, dealing additional damage to your foes.
You create an area of supernatural darkness that obscures vision, shrouding the battlefield in a veil of shadows.
You emit an aura of necrotic energy that deals damage to enemies within a radius at the start of their turn.
A bolt of necrotic energy that deals damage and inflicts a status that reduces the target's healing received.
Unleash a surge of necrotic energy that damages all enemies in a wide area, and applies a status that makes them fearful.
Rend the soul of your target with a powerful necrotic ray, dealing significant damage and applying a status that paralyzes them.
Bestow dark blessings upon your allies, enhancing their abilities and providing them with increased resistance to necrotic damage.
Envelops the area in magical darkness and blinds enemies within it, creating an aura of terror.
Conjures binding necrotic energy that snares enemies, inflicting damage and holding them in place.
Unleash a devastating wave of dark energy, causing intense necrotic damage and instilling fear in all affected enemies.
Unleash a surge of necrotic energy that deals substantial damage and drains the target’s life force, weakening them and restoring some vitality to you.
You gain resistance to necrotic damage, making you more resilient against dark energies.
This wound festers with necrotic energy, dealing damage over time.
You heal for 5% of the damage dealt when you hit a target with a spell.
